title.rendered: Best iPhone XR Black Friday Deals

content.rendered:
Every year, everyone’s favourite retail holiday comes back around in November and it’s bringing some of the best iPhone XR deals EVER! We’ve launched our Black Friday deals early so that you can beat the rush and enjoy better deals for way longer. The iPhone XR is one of our most popular devices and our iPhone XR Black Friday deals are something to scream about.

iPhone XR Deals

There have been hundreds of different iPhone XR deals on the market since its release back in 2018. To date, it’s still a very popular handset and sits in our top 10 best sellers. The iPhone XR is the perfect handset for someone who wants something modern, but still simple. It has a variety of exciting features whilst keeping a very low price! All our Xr deals are packed full of data and add ons however, they hold very low prices. This way, our customers can enjoy desirable smartphones, no matter their budget.

With deals across the top networks in the UK, you can even trust that you’re getting extremely high quality airtime. Each network we work with also provides a few extras on the side to add a little extra value. Paired with free next day delivery, you’re going to be getting the very best service. Get your new smartphone at an outstanding price the very next day, with no issues at all.

About the iPhone XR

There are so many different reasons to love the iPhone XR. One of the most popular reasons is due to it’s variety of fun colours it’s available in. You can choose between black, white, red, yellow, coral and blue with this device! All options have the same glossy finish to make it both look and feel high end. With a Gorilla Glass backing, you don’t have to worry about shattering your phone when you accidentally drop it.

Powering this phone is a 2942mAh battery, which holds hours worth of use in it. You’ll be able to go about your entire day without even thinking about a dead battery. One just one charge, you can go the entire day. If you do need to quickly charge it, just 30 minutes plugged in will get you 50% of your battery. That’s going to set you up perfectly for the rest of your day. The phone supports fast charging 15W and wireless charging to give you more control over what you’re doing.

iPhone XR Features

With social media growing as quickly as it currently is, there’s more and more need for water resistant phones. As people begin to take underwater images or even just photos by the pool, our phones need to stay safe. That’s why the iPhone XR has an IP67 rating, which means it’s pretty resistant to water. You’ll be able to safely use the phone in up to 1 metre of water for 30 minutes. That’s plenty of time to snap a few photos on the beach whilst still making sure your phone stays safe!

Another cool feature on the iPhone XR is Siri. This is something we’ve seen on many iPhones now. It’s essentially an AI voice assistant that allows you to get answers to your questions quicker than ever before. Using this, you can so things so much easier and with less effort. Whether you’re trying to call someone or struggling to spell something, you can just ask Siri.

Best iPhone XR Black Friday Deals

With Black Friday just around the corner, we’ve decided to launch early. We’ve even launched with a few little extras! To start off our Black Friday deals, we’ve got some all time low prices on the iPhone XR right now. When you purchase with EE, you’ll be able to enjoy the iPhone XR at only £32 per month with no upfront cost! This is going to get you access to 50GB of data and the exclusive EE entertainment plan! Enjoy free subscriptions with the likes of BT Sports and BritBox for 3-6 months. This adds tons of value to your Black Friday phone deal.

Not only does EE have an out standing deal, but Three is giving them a run for their money too. Purchasing the iPhone XR on Three is going to give you 100GB of data for £32 per month. The best thing about this deal is there’s absolutely no upfront cost to pay. This deal is also going to get you access to Go Roam and Go Binge at no extra cost. Whether you’re travelling the world or just bored and low on data, Three have got your back.

Every single one of our Black Friday deals brings desirable technology down to affordable prices. With our bills for life competition and #TGIBF campaign, we’re adding even more value to it!
